name: HiLow!
description:
HiLow is a fast paced endless solitaire game. Simply tap the column where the next card is one higher or one lower than the bottom card. Collect chips to unlock all of the decks!

FEATURES
◉ Simple one-touch controls
◉ Unique solitaire inspired endless gameplay
◉ Over 30 different decks to unlock
◉ Variety of achievements to complete
◉ Compete for the top-score on Game Center leaderboards
